script: Ever tried building a robot but ended up with a paperclip monster? Prototyping human-centered AI is like designing a robot that actually helps people. Imagine a chatbot that learns your tone—like a friendly barista remembering your coffee order. Traditional AI is like a robot vacuum: efficient but clueless. Human-centered AI? It’s the difference between a toaster and a personal chef. Why does it matter? Because great AI isn’t just smart—it’s useful. And that starts with prototyping with people in mind.
